__e: You see, the truth is, Walter, that it's easy to believe the worst in ourselves and each other.
It will never be the same because in life there is a constant change, in you, in the rest, in everything.
I know you have a lot to be angry about, but keeping it to yourself and staying quiet like you're doing... it's not going to help you.
I guess when you spend a thousand years with someone, Deciding to quit them is like Losing a part of yourself,
It's best to make babies oneself, but, if you're old and there's a baby ready-made, you'd best take it and keep quiet.
You always say be true to yourself, but you never say which part to be true to.
